    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialise()
      initialise the RMI registry reference for JVM that are not responsible for its creation.
      void instantiateAndPublish()
      simply establish that the instantiation of components and the publication of the entry points are completed, so it should be called at the end of the user's own instantiateAndPublish method.
      void interconnect()
      simply check if instantiation of components and the publication of the entry points are completed, so it should be called at the beginning of the user's own interconnect method.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void shutdown()
      shut down the CVM, synchronising with the other JVM when distributed, i.e. all of the deployed components in the CVM are shut down; inspired from the Java Executor framework.
      boolean startStandardLifeCycle(long duration)
      start the complete standard life-cycle of the component virtual machine to execute the application.

      • Methods inherited from class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI
        shut down the CVM, synchronising with the other JVM when distributed, i.e. all of the deployed components in the CVM are shut down; inspired from the Java Executor framework.

        Contract

         pre    this.allFinalised()
 post   this.isShutdown()       // The shutting down state has still to be
                           // correctly implemented
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

      • startStandardLifeCycle

        public boolean startStandardLifeCycle(long duration)
        Description copied from interface: fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI
        start the complete standard life-cycle of the component virtual machine to execute the application.

        Contract

         pre    duration > 0
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        startStandardLifeCycle in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI
        Overrides:
        startStandardLifeCycle in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the execution before the cutoff in ms.
        Returns:
        true if normal termination, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        ComponentVirtualMachineI.startStandardLifeCycle(long)
